snippet: The tech giant is said to be aiming for an introduction of its streaming music service at its annual developers conference, starting June 10.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Apple is said to be pushing to complete licensing deals with music companies so it can reveal its planned Internet radio service; service will tailor streams of music to each users taste, competing with popular offerings like Pandora.
lead_paragraph: The tech giant is said to be aiming for an introduction of its streaming music service at its annual developers conference, starting June 10.

headline.seo: Apple Is Said to Be Pressing to Complete Deals for Internet Radio
headline.main: Apple Is Said to Be Pressing for Internet Radio Deals
headline.print_headline: Apple Is Said Be Pressing To Finish Internet Radio Deals
